name: Judith MIEGOC v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THROOP FASHIONS/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford) Petition of Throop Fashions/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford
name_abbreviation: Miegoc v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Judith MIEGOC v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THROOP FASHIONS/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford) Petition of Throop Fashions/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of June, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED, and Petitioners’ Petition for Supersedeas is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
977 A.2d 1085
Judith MIEGOC v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THROOP FASHIONS/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford) Petition of Throop Fashions/Leslie Fay and ITT Hartford.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 29, 2009.
